oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 1 from oral history interview with William Lewis Barnes, 2002 December 19
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville Civil Rights Movement participant Rev. William Lewis Barnes, conducted on 19 December 2002 by Ed Hamlett as part of the Nashville Public Library's Civil Rights Oral History Project. Barnes discusses the Tennessee Council of Human Relations and its activities in Fayette County, Tennessee. The complete interview, as well as a transcript, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Barnes, William Lewis--interviews
Tennessee Council of Human Relations
